title: High Renewable Energy Consumption
description: In 2021, 96.3% of the Democratic Republic of the Congo's total final energy consumption came from renewable sources, one of the highest percentages globally.

title: High Combustible Renewables and Waste Usage
description: In 2022, 92.9% of the Democratic Republic of the Congo's total energy consumption was from combustible renewables and waste, indicating a strong reliance on these energy sources.

title: High Poverty Levels
description: In 2020, 98% of the population lived below the $8.30 a day poverty line, highlighting significant economic challenges.

title: Low Access to Basic Drinking Water in Rural Areas
description: As of 2022, only 13.8% of the rural population in the Democratic Republic of the Congo had access to at least basic drinking water services.

title: High Out-of-School Rate for Primary School Age Children
description: In 2019, 63.2% of primary school age children were out of school, indicating significant educational challenges.
